settings.text: View our most frequently asked questions about the Petsnowy
A:  We don't have a locked time, but it will be in late February!

A：Please click the link below to bookmark our official pre-sale page. The official SNOW+ purchase page will be updated at the end of February!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/petsnowy-the-innovative-self-cleaning-litter-box/coming_soon

Exclusive Super Early Bird Deals starting at just $479. 

The SNOW+ is listed for $519 on Indiegogo, which is 40% off the tag price of $865. 

There’s also a TiO2-free deodorant version at $479 if you don’t have much concern with odour control. 

The 40% Super Early Bird Perk and the $30 Off are stackable discounts. Reserve the limited-time offer here.
